title: Sivir Pax
body: Anyone know where I can buy a code and just the code not an account? Been looking but cant find it though people still find them here and there.

replies.body: It's sad that skin is so super rare now as I feel the whole TRON vibe it gives off makes it her best skin since her VU.  Too bad that Riot can't give out any of those old PAX skins either as I like the look of PAX Jax with his cardboard tube samurai outfit.
You can't anymore because Riot has disabled all skin codes created before a certain date.

> You can't anymore because Riot has disabled all skin codes created before a certain date.

This is correct. Any codes someone claims to be selling will not work. Unfortunately, there isn't a way to obtain PAX Sivir. Sorry!

Would you guys ever consider bringing them back around maybe one more time for future PAX events? Or are you even allowed to? (I've heard there was some contract between Riot and the PAX people that prevents it).

As a Sivir main, it makes me sad that I learned about League after the event she came out in. PAX Sivir (a.k.a. Tron sivir, as I like to call her) is honestly the greatest skin I have ever seen but never played. T_T

Edit: Just read the above comments. Apparently I'm not the first one to refer to her as Tron. lol. xD

I'm pretty sure Riot couldn't even if they wanted to. The skins are legally tangled up with PAX (as in the actually organization) and Riot's now allowed to release them again. Note why everything is now a Riot skin.
